name: nextcloud-forms
description: Nextcloud Forms is a privacy-friendly alternative to Google Forms. It allows creating custom forms, sharing links, and collecting responses, fully integrated into self-hosted Nextcloud.

features.title: Form Builder
features.description: Create custom forms with multiple question types including text, multiple choice, and dropdowns

features.title: Anonymous Responses
features.description: Collect submissions without requiring user authentication for public surveys

features.title: Response Collection
features.description: Gather and organize form submissions with timestamps and user information

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download responses as CSV or Excel files for analysis and reporting

features.title: Question Logic
features.description: Show or hide questions based on previous answers for dynamic forms

features.title: Required Fields
features.description: Mark questions as mandatory to ensure complete submissions

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Generate public URLs for forms that can be shared via email or social media

features.title: Response Limits
features.description: Set submission deadlines or maximum response counts to close forms automatically
